mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT M.MENU_CODE AS CODE, M.MENU_NAME AS TITLE, M.MENU_ICON AS ICON, M.MENU_URL AS HREF, M.MENU_SEQ, M.PARENT_MENU_CODE AS PARENT FROM SYS_USER_ROLE UR, SYS_ROLE R, SYS_AUTHORIZE A, SYS_MENU M WHERE UR.ROLE_CODE = R.ROLE_CODE AND R.ROLE_CODE = A.ROLE_CODE AND A.RESOURCE_ID = M.MENU_CODE AND A.RESOURCE_TYPE = '01' AND M.IS_START='1' AND M.PARENT_MENU_CODE='0' AND UR.USER_CODE = #{username} ORDER BY M.MENU_SEQ

SELECT DISTINCT M.MENU_CODE AS CODE, M.MENU_NAME AS TITLE, M.MENU_ICON AS ICON, M.MENU_URL AS HREF, M.PARENT_MENU_CODE AS PARENT, M.MENU_SEQ,M.MENU_LEVEL FROM SYS_USER_ROLE UR, SYS_ROLE R, SYS_AUTHORIZE A, SYS_MENU M WHERE UR.ROLE_CODE = R.ROLE_CODE AND R.ROLE_CODE = A.ROLE_CODE AND A.RESOURCE_ID = M.MENU_CODE AND A.RESOURCE_TYPE = '01' AND M.IS_START='1' AND M.PARENT_MENU_CODE like '${parentMenuCode}%' AND UR.USER_CODE = #{username} ORDER BY M.MENU_LEVEL,M.MENU_SEQ
